level.heading: Personal property of owner not affecting sale.
level.text: The power to sell real property for taxes shall not be affected by personal property of the owner on the real property to be sold.

level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) addition of section, see ยง 7 of Real Property Tax Clarity and Litter Control Administration Temporary Amendment Act of 2001 (D.C. Law 14-8, June 13, 2001, law notification 48 DCR 5916).

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see ยง 7 of Real Property Tax Clarity and Litter Control Administration Emergency Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-22, March 16, 2001, 48 DCR 2706).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-305
level.text: For Law 13-305, see notes under ยง 47-901.
